Articles.Content:
(already solved the problem)upfront sorry for my english i know its not perfect and thanks for the help. i have trouble with the kopernicus mod i have all the mods from this video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UKbWx-bTOw0 

but newer and i try to turn ksp (1.12.4) on and it says kopernicus was not able to load the custom planetary system due to an exeption in the loading process and i dont know what to do i already tried to move in to difernt locations downloading it manualy and via ckan downloading different versions and other things but nothing works here is a link for the bug report and a image of the warning in ksp https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Pp5SDnSsO5A40KfvHSVlNAefj6Po4HNh?usp=drive_link\

(already solved the problem)

Edited April 3 by victor_10207

20 hours ago, victor_10207 said:

already solved the problem)

It’s usually nice to include your solution to the problem so others who stumble upon this thread years from now from a google search can have some resolution too.
